Content: Does anybody know BIOS tricks to get a MB to boot headless (without a GPU)? Specifically this MB: https://www.msi.com/Motherboard/B450M-PRO-M2/Specification

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content: I don't want to sound stupid but it has onboard graphics no?  The HDMI port would indicate it should be able to fire up.

Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
I would tell your friend NOT to remove the graphics card from a running MB... as a standard of good practice.  

Can he/she?  Sure.   
Will problems arise?   I don't know, you'd have to google that.

Content:
`what I am after, is a rig that will boot with no graphics card at all, and be a CPU miner`
Then you need:
a) a CPU with integrated graphics
or
b) a motherboard with integrated graphics
